wikipedia_page.main: Richard Howitt (21 July 1864 Farnsfield Grange, Nottinghamshire, England-10 January 1951 Farndon, Nottinghamshire, England) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket for Nottinghamshire from 1893-1901.
